sub_title: Project/Change Management consultant, Professional Coach (Result Coaching)
summary:
Qualified by 15 years of Project and Portfolio management and Customer Care management experience, including:
- 7 years in program/project management in an aggressive implementation and integration environment for one of the world’s largest private telecoms.
- 8 years launching and managing top-flight technical customer care organizations for Siemens.
- leadership and management of international teams.

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam, Netherlands and Prague, Czech Republic
profile_positions.description:
Providing trainings and consultations in Project/Program/Portfolio management areas, Agile methodologies, incl. PMI certification trainings (CAPM, PMI). 

Providing trainings and consultations in Change management area based on CMI methodology.

Tailored made trainings in all above mentioned areas available upon request.

Certified Professional Coach (Result Coach).
profile_positions.title: Project/Change management consultant and trainer, Proffesional Coach

profile_positions.description:
Professional trainer in following areas:
- PMI Project Management,
- SCRUM and other Agile methodologies,  
- ITIL
- Program and Portfolio Management
profile_positions.title: Trainer

profile_positions.description:
•	Focus on further professional development 
•	English language intensive courses
•	PMI PMP (Project Management Professional) Certification, 2013, Kansas City
•	PMI ACP (Agile Certified Practitioner) training, 2014, Kansas City
•	PROSCI Certified Change manager, 2015, Colorado Springs
•	PMI conferences and trainings, 2013-2015, USA
profile_positions.title: US Training & Parental leave

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for definition of IT Transformation strategy with respect to global O2 IT strategy (IT operation outsourcing (550 HC), SW development Processes&Tools unification, SW development and maintenance suppliers consolidation (4 main suppliers), Data centers consolidation (only 4 main data centers worldwide))

Key responsibilities included:
-	Definition, management and monitoring of entire IT Transformation project portfolio, provided prioritization, critical resources management and reporting to CIO, CTO and Top management
-	Development of IT PMO office, incl. internal methodology creation, processes and tools, monitored IT projects portfolio (25 concurrent projects)  
-	Management of team of internal/external project managers (6 internal and 12 external project managers)
-	Support and mentoring project managers of the strategic projects
-	Closely cooperated with CIO on specific topics, i.e. Gartner external IT audit, roles and responsibilities changes, headcount reduction etc.

1.	Outsourced IT Operation
•	Outsourcing of 550 IT Operation employees into O2 CZ subsidiary
profile_positions.title: IT Transformation and PMO manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Defined project portfolio (roadmap) leading to transformation of Eurotel (mobile provider) and Cesky Telecom (Fix provider) – merge of two companies into new one 
O2 Czech Republic
•	Defined and implemented Transformation projects methodology
•	Closely cooperated with Top Management on transformation related issues resolution
•	Managed internal Transformation team (8 employees)
	
1.	Managed Re-branding project
•	Project bringing new O2 brand on the Czech market incl. few innovative services, 
 i.e. Fix/Mobile/Internet bundles, IPTV – TV over fix line
•	Project consisted of 8 main streams, i.e. brand, product marketing, legal, real estate,
etc. (80+ team members, budget of €20mio)

2.	Implemented tool for project and portfolio management based on CA Clarity
•	Replacement of existing in-house developed tool for Project/Portfolio   management by top-in-class tool CA Clarity (team of 30 employees, budget €1,5mio)
profile_positions.title: Integration manager

profile_positions.description:
CEE region - Austria, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Romania, Slovakia, Serbia and Montenegro, Slovenia, Switzerland

•	Defined, developed and monitored full range of customer care services including hotline support services for Serbia, Monte Negro, Slovenia, Croatia, Bulgaria and Romania, 
•	Customer Care Key account manager for T-Mobile, Vodafone, Orange
•	Responsible for monitoring and reporting defined KPIs (# of repairs, time-to-repair, failure rate, etc.)

Initiated a number of internal initiatives to improve effectiveness and efficiency:
1.	Outsourced call center activities:
	-  Consolidated hotline support services from six countries into one single regional 		  	hotline support center in Austria
	-  Provided expertise, mentoring and hiring support during transition period

2.      Implemented Web based tool:	
         - Tool allowing repair centers to share spare parts, automatic shipment and tracking of bulk    repairs, knowledge transfer as well as best practices for issue resolution & escalation
profile_positions.title: Customer Care manager RHQ CEE

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for development of Customer Care in the Czech Republic - awarded
Best Siemens Customer Care in 2000 in internal contest within 36 other countries

Key responsibilities included:
-	Design and implementation of new repair centers
-	Recruitment & management of HR related issues (growth from 3 to 65 employees)
-	Definition & implementation of internal initiatives to achieve operational excellence in 
a strong growing environment (e.g. number of repairs grew from 250 to 14.000	per month)

1.	Implemented repair management tool implementation based on APERTUM (1999)
2.	E-shop implementation (2000)
3.	Web based repair tool (2002), allowing T-Mobile, Vodafone and O2 Point 
of Sales to register, manage and track repair inquires of Siemens phones
profile_positions.title: CEO of SIEMENS subsidiary and Customer Care manager for the Czech Republic
